stable.body: # Click to Download Check #36 for more info # Design + Light theme + Option to change theme + Back button for toolbars + Checkboxes, switches and progress bars are now blue when activated + Rounded corners for bottom dialogs + All bottom dialogs are now scrollable + More animations # Merging maps + You can now add maps on top of a map + `Manage maps > Merge maps` # Maps management + Activity doesn't restart anymore when deleting maps + Updated thumbnail look + Fixed thumbnails not showing correctly # Map options + Title now changes to map name + Better picker for map types + Better input for number options + Server name no longer uses hardcoded value + Fixed number options having an additional space + Fixed checkpoints causing error # Map roles + Separate activity for managing map roles + Role colors now show in app (not all colors are supported) + You can now copy role name by long pressing on it # Wallpapers management + Deleting wallpapers now also works on Android 11 and above + Floating save button + Fixed wallpapers not showing correctly # Changes & fixes + Screenshots can now be deleted + Imported maps are now in alphabetical order + LAC now gets detected properly on Android 11 and above + Fixed some dialogs' titles not being centered + Fixed app not creating required folders on first launch # Removed features - Removed Turkish language - Removed force English language option - Removed colors from debug log # Other changes + Updated target Android version to 31 + Improved permissions on Android 11 and above + Renamed GalleryActivity to ScreenshotsActivity + Use Bundle when passing data to fragments + Updated Gradle, PickiT and dependencies + Removed unused permission: `ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE` # Known issues - WallpaperActivity always has debug on - ScreenshotsActivity always has debug on View this release on [GitHub](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/releases/tag/20)

preRelease.body:
## Features
- scoped storage permissions [#58](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/58) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/59e65e702091a2dcf3984f15028544be604b4e1b))
- use material3 bottom sheets [#51](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/51) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/1c5ff94c3be8370356c716ddc756393f4193904b))
- new map list with search and sorting options [#59](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/59) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/161007e269764428cc958ccc2c340c04e665554e))
- stick to material 3 design [#60](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/60) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/055c539132d51a70aaeb294d6e051b41b5288191))
- improve splash screen [#57](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/57) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/78719069d0c373cecdfcf8a2cce78e1f65094daf))

## Code Refactoring
- **alpha-warning-dialog**: move logic to MainViewModel [#57](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/57) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/19db45139f80ca68b52fdd28d8a983bfe4e0a01c))

## Chores
- update Gradle, Kotlin, AGP and dependencies [#57](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/57) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/cae1fe4e6afda6595e9373740bf4548acbde414f))
- bump version to v3.0.0-alpha05 (30005) [#57](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/57) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/c54c7887d7b929477cc5e8bde0d0ffef4832821d))
- merge `dev` branch into `main` [#57](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/57) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/02fa665b218dea9f1f2d244aaa90bd6a44856706))

View this release on [GitHub](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/releases/tag/v3.0.0-alpha05)
